channel.title: Conquest 317 - Release!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://puu.sh/3dGTl.png[/img]
[COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR] is a server i've been working on for some time to release for people to play. You will notice upon log in a lot of things are different in this server than that in which is in other servers.
[CENTER]Introduction: [COLOR="#ADD8E6"]Conquest[/COLOR] trys to offer everyone a fun time and a overall fun server to play. While it is economy based the PKing in it is also very good we highly recommend everyone at least give it a try! [/CENTER]
[B][U]Current Progress: Released due to lack of player count.[/U][/B]
[B][I][U]Media: [/U][/I][/B]
Home Media: [SPOILER=Home Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_17.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=758834256324[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_14.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=97253365209[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_15.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=432131789158[/img] [/SPOILER]
Training Teleports: [SPOILER=Training Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_16.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=885512762702[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_12.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=95749212196[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_7.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=747028507058[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_5.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=501764330313[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_4.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=341230053454[/img] [/SPOILER]
Skilling Areas: [SPOILER=Skilling Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_8.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=80689455149[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_9.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=649287489009[/img] [/SPOILER]
Bosses and MiniGames: [SPOILER=Boss Media] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_13.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=565600252709[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_6.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=422290244139[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_1.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=267344892024[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_10.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=465632939245[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/756d8be8_l.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/234dcc3e_l.png[/img] [img]http://www.use.com/images/s_2/0ee4862ad8df8d1cc323_11.jpg?is=true&ps=true&rand=513453372520[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H388dP5hUWc&feature=youtu.be]Null - YouTube[/url] [/SPOILER]
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/490953-conquest-317-time-start-your-journey.html][img]http://i.imgur.com/TWjn20f.png[/img][/url]
Thanks for your time everyone!
Client - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27803395/Conquest%20Client.zip
Server - https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/27803395/Conquest%20Server.zip
Please no hate, as it will be disgarded. [/CENTER]

item.title: Conquest 317 - Release!
item.dc:creator: @ExiledNoob ExiledNoob
item.description:
@ExiledNoob wrote:

I’m very very sorry to grave-dig, but I have come too far to just give up now. I have been searching for a good base that I like for 3 days now so I can start a hands-on learning experience of how to run/code/maintain a RSPS. I finally found this one and I really really want it to be the one that I learn how to code on, but I’ve got a very simple problem. Its like a twig is blocking my path. But I’m very new to coding so naturally I need a little help.

I cannot get the server to connect. The client comes up - Allows me to enter in a username and password, but it just wont connect when I hit login. Can anyone tell when what I need to change? I got everything working so far but now I just need to get past the “error connecting to server”.

The debug says "Server listening on port exilium.no-ip.biz:43594
Could this be the problem or no?
Perhaps it’s trying to connect to an IP that doesnt exist? If so, where can I find this in the code and would I change it to my own IP?
Myabe this source is just broken?
I dont know, but a little help would be very appreciated

Read full topic

[quote=“JDETSC, post:21, topic:528256”]Just by looking at the last few photos, not to mention all.

Makes me realize that your cache is so nulldy and ugly.

Thanks for contributing, 4/10[/quote]

Besides re-naming some things I didn’t really touch the client, I just used one that was compatible with my source and worked from there i’m not any good with clients, sadly.

item.title: Conquest 317 - Release!
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

Mikeyzzz:

Great contribution, but for future reference, maybe try using a home that wouldn’t be so cramp if the playerbase was to build up.

Thanks for the positive comment, as for the home I wanted something different everyone seems to have their home at edgeville and I wanted a home where everything you need was there and that was it (and it wasn’t over used) I planned on making a trading market (to prevent home from being packed) which is the only place you can trade but the lack of active players really discouraged me.

kyle owns u:

Overall 6/10 truthfully, its pretty cool but you just need some tweaks, like i would rather have the slayer dungeon and an edgeville home, but mostly, i like it

Thanks, I hope you give it a try and find some of my features good to add onto your own base.

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:16, topic:528256”]I beta’d this for Microzoft when it was still in earlier stages. Was a pretty fun server to be on. I encourage anybody who wishes to try something different to take a look at this.

One note: when I played this money was pretty easy to get so yeah…might want to consider revamping the crystal chest.[/quote]

Thanks a lot I remember you beta-testing it, wish it would have become more popular, but you know it happens.

Money was easy but I planned on halfing drops of keys, money certificates, and money in general at public release to make the economy better but as mentioned above the playercount was too low.

Read full topic
